mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.recipe_info (recipe_id, recipe_nm_ko, sumry, nation_code, nation_nm, ty_code, ty_nm, cooking_time, calorie, qnt, level_nm, irdnt_code, pc_nm) VALUES(#{RECIPE_ID}, #{RECIPE_NM_KO}, #{SUMRY}, #{NATION_CODE}, #{NATION_NM}, #{TY_CODE}, #{TY_NM}, #{COOKING_TIME}, #{CALORIE}, #{QNT}, #{LEVEL_NM}, #{IRDNT_CODE}, #{PC_NM}) ON CONFLICT (recipe_id) DO NOTHING;
